resources.title: English
resources.string_upd:
To enable this module, chat server must be installed separately.
Enter the chat URL in this module settings.
Then OAuth login must be configured. Generate Key & Secret pair in OAuth2 Server module by pointing chat URL and desired name.
After Key & Secret pair is generated you need to enter them in Chat Administration > OAuth > Trident.
To enable Helpdesk Chat you need to enable it in the Chat Administration > Livechat and in this module settings. You don't need to insert JS code, it is added automatically.
